items.title: Rate limiting when fetching from Companies House API in bulk
items.body: We're getting 429 responses when looping over a large list of company numbers. The Companies House API throttles at 600 req/5 min. Would be great to have built-in backoff.

items.title: Parse iXBRL annual accounts from Companies House filing API
items.body: Need to extract balance sheet data and profit and loss figures from the iXBRL documents. The taxonomy references make this non-trivial.
